properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
PUERTO RICO.
M/V MSC IDIL, 25 PERSONS ON BOARD, REPORTED AN
EXPLOSION ON BOARD IN 19-27.12N 066-06.4W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO U.S. COAST GUARD SAN JUAN,
PHONE: 787 289 2047, E-MAIL: SSJCC@USCG.MIL.
